sen.j: 夷川通（えびすがわどおり）は京都市内の東西の通りの一つ。
sen.e: The Ebisugawa-dori Street is an east-west running street in Kyoto City.
The Ebisugawa-dori Street is a street running east-west running in Kyoto City.
The Ebisugawa-dori Street is a street running east-west running in Kyoto City.

sen.j: 東は鴨川 (淀川水系)西岸から西は堀川通まで。
sen.e: It runs from the west bank of the Kamo-gawa River (Yodo-gawa water system) in the east to the Horikawa-dori Street in the west.
It runs from the west bank of the Kamo-gawa River (Yodo-gawa water system) in the east to Horikawa-dori Street in the west.
It runs from the west bank of the Kamo-gawa River (Yodo-gawa water system) in the east to Horikawa-dori Street in the west.

sen.j: 鴨川と寺町通の間ではやや南にずれている。
sen.e: It deviates somewhat southward between the Kamo-gawa River and the Teramachi-dori Street.
It deviates somewhat southward between Kamo-gawa River and Teramachi-dori Street.
It deviates somewhat southward between Kamo-gawa River and Teramachi-dori Street.

sen.j: 平安京の冷泉小路（れいぜいこうじ）にあたる。
sen.e: It corresponds to the Reizei-koji Street of Heiankyo.
It corresponds to Reizei-koji Street of Heiankyo.
It corresponds to Reizei-koji Street of Heiankyo.

sen.j: 寺町通から烏丸通の間は家具屋街として有名である。
sen.e: The section between the Teramachi-dori Street and the Karasuma-dori Street is famous for its furniture dealer district.
The section between Teramachi-dori Street and Karasuma-dori Street is famous for its furniture dealer district.
The section between Teramachi-dori Street and Karasuma-dori Street is famous for its furniture dealer district.

sen.j: 鴨川東岸の冷泉通と二条通に挟まれた地域にも、西からの延長線上に夷川通が存在する。
sen.e: In the eastern side of the Kamo-gaw River the Ebisugawa-dori Street also exists between the Reisen-dori Street and the Nijo-dori Street.on an imaginary line extended from the west.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: On the eastern side of the Kamo-gawa River, Ebisugawa-dori Street also exists between Reisen-dori Street and Nijo-dori Street on an imaginary line which extends from the west.
On the eastern side of the Kamo-gawa River, Ebisugawa-dori Street also exists between Reisen-dori Street and Nijo-dori Street on an imaginary line which extends from the west.

sen.j: 京都市地理として「夷川通」が用いられている。
sen.e: The name of "Ebisugawa-dori Street" is also used for the street as a geographic name of Kyoto City.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: The name "Ebisugawa-dori Street" is also used as name to refer to an area in the geography of Kyoto City.
sen.cmt: Robert: The Japanese is kind of unclear… may want to check with client
sen.e: The name 'Ebisugawa-dori Street' is also used as name to refer to an area in the geography of Kyoto City.

sen.j: なお、昭和初期の大洪水までは、鴨川に橋があり、これら東西の夷川通りはつながっていた。
sen.e: The two streets had been connected by a bridge over the Kamo-gawa River until a flood in the early Showa era.
sen.cmt: 「なお」は特に意味がないため訳していません。
sen.e: The two streets had been connected by a bridge over the Kamo-gawa River until a flood in the early Showa era.
The two streets had been connected by a bridge over the Kamo-gawa River until a flood in the early Showa period.
Reisenn-dori Street
Reisenn-dori Street
Reisen-dori Street

sen.j: 冷泉通（れいせんどおり）は鴨川以西の夷川通を東へ延長した線上よりもやや北にあり、西は川端通から東は左京区若王子町まで。
sen.e: Located somewhat north of an imaginary line extended east from the Ebisugawa-dori Street of the western side of the Kamo-gawa River, the Reisenn-dori Street runs from the Kawabata-dori Street in the west to the Nyakuoji-cho, Sakyo Ward in the east.

Located somewhat north of an imaginary line which extends east from Ebisugawa-dori Street of the western side of the Kamo-gawa River, Reisenn-dori Street runs from Kawabata-dori Street in the west to Nyakuoji-cho, Sakyo Ward in the east.

Located somewhat north of an imaginary line which extends east from Ebisugawa-dori Street of the western side of the Kamo-gawa River, Reisen-dori Street runs from Kawabata-dori Street in the west to Nyakuoji-cho, Sakyo Ward in the east.

sen.j: 平安神宮の南側、応天門前を通る通りである。
sen.e: It passes in front of Oten-mon mae (front of Oten-mon gate) of Heian Jingu.
It passes in front of Oten-mon mae (front of Oten-mon gate) of Heian Jingu.
It passes in front of Oten-mon mae (front of Oten-mon gate) of Heian Jingu.

sen.j: 平安神宮より西では琵琶湖疏水の南に沿い、この区間に夷川ダム（関西電力夷川発電所）がある。
sen.e: The section west of Heianjigu runs along the southern edge of the Biwako Sosui (channel), along which Ebisugawa Dam (Ebisugawa Electric Power Plant of Kansai Electric Power Co., Inc.) is located.
The section west of Heianjigu runs along the southern edge of the Biwako Sosui (channel), along which Ebisugawa Dam (Ebisugawa Electric Power Plant of Kansai Electric Power Co., Inc.) is located.

The section west of Heian-jingu runs along the southern edge of the Biwako Sosui (channel) in the west, along which Ebisugawa Dam (Ebisugawa Electric Power Plant of Kansai Electric Power Co., Inc.) is located.
sen.cmt: スペルを修正in the west補足

sen.j: 夷川と名前が変わる前の古い時代の呼称が残る区間である。
sen.e: The names in old ages before the name "Ebisugawa" was given still remain in this section.
Names given before "Ebisugawa" was given still remain in this section.
Names given before Ebisugawa was given still remain in this section.
